00014 #ifndef HOSTSTATE_H
00015 #define HOSTSTATE_H
00016 
00017 #include <omnetpp.h>
00018 
00019 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00020 
00035 class MIXIM_API HostState : public cObject
00036 {
00037 public:
00041     enum States
00042         {
00043           ACTIVE, 
00044           FAILED, 
00046           BROKEN, 
00048           SLEEP,  
00049           OFF     
00050         };
00051     // we could make a nice 'info' field here, to allow us to specify
00052     // the cause of failure (e.g. battery, stochastic hardware failure)
00053 
00054 private:
00058     States state;
00059 
00060 public:
00064     HostState(States state = ACTIVE):
00065     state(state)
00066   {}
00067 
00069     States get() const { return state; }
00071     void set(States s) { state = s; }
00072 
00076     std::string info() const {
00077     std::ostringstream ost;
00078     switch(state) {
00079     case ACTIVE:
00080       ost << "ACTIVE";
00081       break;
00082     case FAILED:
00083       ost << "FAILED";
00084       break;
00085     case BROKEN:
00086       ost << "BROKEN";
00087       break;
00088     case SLEEP:
00089       ost << "SLEEP";
00090       break;
00091     case OFF:
00092       ost << "OFF";
00093       break;
00094     default:
00095       ost << "Unknown";
00096       break;
00097     }
00098     return ost.str();
00099   }
00100 };
00101 
00102 #endif
